DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics Small Clown Cuffs
DescriptionData.Description: Oversized French-style cuffs with Jumbo Buttons are another terrific clown accessory to finish off your look. Wear with a vest or over a long sleeved clown shirt for a cool comfortable combination. Velcro closure fits snug to wrist, cuffs have assorted button colors. Small Cuffs are 6.5 inches at the widest point.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Oversized French-style cuffs with Jumbo Buttons are another terrific clown accessory
Velcro closure fits snug to wrist
